<summary>Water companies are pressing the government to exempt them from stricter tax rules on interest costs. 
The debt-laden utilities say that proposed changes to the tax deductibility of interest, likely to be announced in next monthâs Budget, threaten to push up customersâ bills.
Water UK, representing the industry, said the âgreat majorityâ of water companies would be affected if the government caps tax relief on interest costs. It called for a âpublic benefit exemptionâ that would apply to utiliti...</summary><wordCount>371</wordCount><archiveUuid>59269d7c-d0f9-11e5-abab-57192cd3e698</archiveUuid></props>
